tool_description: Exports taxonomy data in various standard formats for integration with annotation tools and machine learning frameworks.

taxonomy_id.description: ID of the taxonomy to export

export_format.description: Output format: json, xml, csv, yaml, or coco_format

output_path.description: Destination path for the exported file

include_metadata.description: Whether to include taxonomy metadata in export

error_messages: Taxonomy not found: The specified taxonomy_id does not exist.
Invalid export format: Supported formats are json, xml, csv, yaml, coco_format.
Output path not accessible: Cannot write to the specified output_path.
Export failed: Unable to generate export in the requested format.
usage: Provide taxonomy_id, export_format, and output_path. Optionally include_metadata in the export. The tool generates formatted taxonomy exports compatible with various tools.

export_status.description: Export operation status: success, failed, or partial

output_file_path.description: Full path to the generated export file

file_size_bytes.description: Size of the exported file in bytes

exported_labels_count.description: Number of labels included in the export

export_summary.description: Summary of the export operation and file contents
